# Guidelines {.unnumbered}

Generally, follow the guidelines of the [catalogue of works](https://www.gregor-joseph-werner.at/guidelines.html) by Gregor Joseph Werner, with the following exceptions:

- The name of the XML file is `TumW_[group]_[number].xml`.
- Work, identification
  - TumW: number according to this catalogue 
  - BalTh: number in the thematic catalogue by @Ball1900
  - KliCh: number in the thematic catalogue by @Klinka1975
  - PesMa: number in the thematic catalogue of masses by @Peschek1956
  - ReiMa: number in the thematic catalogue of masses by @Reichert1935
  - VogIn: number in the thematic catalogue by @Vogg1951
